directives: ABANDON heavy libraries: sklearn, pandas, matplotlib, scipy are forbidden.
ADAPT to hardware: Current CPU (Helio G85) is weak. Optimize for O(1) or O(n) complexity.
PURE_LOGIC: Rebuild clustering and pattern recognition using raw Python math operators.
DYNAMIC_IQ: Prioritize heuristic-based decision making over batch matrix processing.
STABILITY: Never use plt.show() or any graphical blocking calls.
goal: Achieve Hyper Intelligence through recursive self-optimization of pure algorithms.
